name: Meat³
description:
Meat3

Inspired by the cloning mechanic in "The Swapper", a 2D game where the player can clone itself, but the clones copy your every move.

I decided to bring this into the third dimension for the Mix and Game Jam!

Your goal is to reach the blue thingy. Use your clones to open doors.

Controls
  • WASD: Move
  • Arrow Keys: Spawn a clone
